data.actual_result: The status bar is missing except for if you are charging your battery
data.expected_result: The status bar is there as it is on dark theme
data.short_description: The status bar is missing on the quick switcher [Light Theme Only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings, navigate down to appearance, and select light theme  - Hit close and go to the left to the quick switcher  - Now open the quick switcher.  - Observe the top where the status bar should be..
